author: dildick
body: #### PR description: This PR introduces a validation module for GEM pad digi clusters. It is based on the GEM pad digi validation module. I also cleaned up some of the outdated code. For instance, I replaced the "generic" digis with the actual GEM digis/pads throughout the code. #### PR validation: It tested this with WF 11634.0. The new cluster plots are presented in the DQM ROOT file. The first DQM plot shows the locations (in R-Z) of the strip digis in sample with 10 events. The second DQM plot shows the corresponding pads (OR of two strip digis). The third DQM plot show the clusters of neighboring pads. #### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR: N/A @jshlee @tahuang1991
title: Validation module for GEM pad digi clusters
